udarata hamudawe bahutharaya sathara koralayata ayath bawa 'sathara koralaye maha lekam mitiye " sandahan wenawa.eeta amatharawa rajuge maligawe aarakshawata siti 942k wu aarakshakayan siyalu denama sathara korala wasin bawath asala perahare aarakshawa sathara koralayata bhara di athi bawath sandahan.thawada wirathwaya sandaha pirinamena sammana 5n 5mada labadi "athi wishwasa shri jayawardhana sathara korale" yana nambu namayada labadi udarata sesu disa abhibawa mahanuwara asala perahare peramunenma gaman kirime warayada sathara korala wasiyanta labadi thibenawa.
